doc:
Walter Koenig https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Koenig 0 Walter Marvin Koenig (; born September 14, 1936) is an American actor, writer, teacher and director, known for his roles as Pavel Chekov in Star Trek and Alfred Bester in the Babylon 5 series. He wrote the script for the 2008 science fiction legal thriller InAlienable. Walter_Marvin_Koenig ( ; born September_14_,_1936 ) is an_American_actor , writer_,_teacher_and_director , known for his_roles as Pavel_Chekov in Star_Trek and Alfred_Bester in the_Babylon_5_series . He wrote the_script for the_2008_science_fiction_legal_thriller_InAlienable .
